name: deimosrising
text: Surprisingly, this is an effective tactic for use on certain strains of woman.

name: abe
text: Try to open your eyes as wide as you can and pretend to have a seizure.

name: jollysaintpete
text: i'm going to try that, honestly

name: em2
text: Let us know how that works out.

name: saint
text:
I tries this.

I did NOT get fresh with that tactic.

name: soticoto
text:
Works well enough...
But then the girl I exchange saliva with only likes me cos I share her fascination with serial killers.

name: evolume
text: I just do it.  They only find out that I'm doing it if they peek.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: hear hear

name: norrin
text: Crazy women?

name: spinynorman
text: Haha, did you refer to women as "strains", much like a virus?

name: bixschmix
text: It makes me a little paranoid that I would be referred to as such.

name: spinynorman
text: It seems unlikely that women are a virus. The only known inoculations against women are being too close to your mother as a child and possibly watching too many gladiator movies. And even that's uncertain.

name: tekende
text: This reminds me of a review of Aliens Vs. Predator I read in a college paper. The review referred to the movie as a "new strain of suck."

name: woodenteeth
text: I would like to suggest that this strain infiltrated and decimated what seemed like quite a clever premise.

name: gunsofray
text: Don't worry, ive had my vaccinations.

name: woodenteeth
text: The Vaccine is still in the Prepatory Stages.

name: mortshire
text:
reminds me of that scene in me and you and everyone we know:
))<>((

i would actually find that kisses line endearing in a naive way.

name: relaxing
text: Best diss on gallery curators ever.

name: ambala
text: that line makes me ten kinds of uncomfortable.

name: stuart
text: I fuckin' dare you to enumerate them.

name: woodenteeth
text: 1. Anne, 2. Jody, 3. Joanne, 4. Katy, 5. Crystal, 6. Starla, 7. Candy, 8. Jugs McGee, 9. Sis, 10. That one junky under the bridge that one last time.

name: greenkoolayd
text: way to make me feel insecure at only having one person on my list... /projection

name: woodenteeth
text: You've only long-deep-kissed-with-your-eyes-wide-open once?! What a tragic life you lead.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: Huge scared eyes.

name: f1shst1ck
text: Eyes wide open, good old Lyle

name: epicurus
text: Do chicks really dig that? My eyes are always closed because I imagine that it is an apatosaurus (rar!) because think how cool!

name: jlynes
text:
I dare you to tell your lady-friend that you are imagining her as a 40-ton sauropod.

I'll be able to hear the slap from here to find out if you've won.

name: jaiden
text: It's hard to tell if Lyle is trying to sabotage Teodor, or if he's just really weird about making out.

name: zedpower
text: My money's on sabotage.

name: farqussus
text: Yeah. Not that hard. It's Lyle.

name: rowboat
text: I must be some kind of rube, but Lyle seems more genuinely helpful than ever, here.  I mean, I'm sitting here reading this and I know....but if I'm Téodor, I think Lyle catches me with my guard down, here.  Bad for me.  If I'm Téodor.

name: quarantine
text: Who would ever take romantic advice from Lyle?

name: hcaz
text: Oh man, I remember when I had just started high school and we were at some silly school dance when one of my good friends went at it with some chick just like that for about ten minutes straight. It was painful to watch and this strip brings back those painful memories. Oh, baby.

name: ph3r
text:
The question is - what did Teodor say last time that's a decent lead-in to long deep kisses?

This question shall haunt me forever.

name: berami
text: I'm kind of surprised that Lyle has any sort of idea how to sweet-talk a lady.  I'm even more surprised Teodor is willing to listen to him.
